channel.title: Technical Documentation â€“ L4 Support
channel.description: Recent content in L4 Support on Technical Documentation

item.title: Docs: Timeline and Jira Fields
item.description:
Timeline for L4 support team is set in Jira ticket. This timeline depends on the ticket type and the SLA agreed with the customer in NCT.

Note: A Jira ticket is always compliant with the NCT SLA.

It is preferable/mandatory to set the certain fields in Jira during ticket creation for the L4 support team.

item.title: Docs: Create date of NCT ticket
item.description:
This field is set to provide the NCT ticket creation date.

Currently, there is no separate field available to provide this information; therefore, it is mentioned in the Description field. A separate field will be available in the next Jira release.

item.title: Docs: Due date for Jira ticket
item.description: This field sets the due date to fix the Jira ticket by the L4 support team. This timeline is set to 5-10 days lesser from the NCT ticket end date. The L2/L3 support team keeps 5-10 days as a buffer for final case closure.

item.title: Docs: L3 analysis
item.description: This field is set to provide the brief description of the issue and troubleshooting details till date. This information is provided in the Description field of the Jira ticket.

item.title: Docs: Logs and traces
item.description: This field is set to provide the issue logs of the system captured by the Support engineer. This information can be provided as an attachment in the Attachment field.

item.title: Docs: End date of NCT ticket
item.description:
This field is set to provide the end date of the NCT ticket.

Note: Currently, there is no separate field available to provide this information; therefore, it is mentioned in the Description field. A separate field will be available in the next Jira release.
